name: Shehata Antonious
degree: Master in Computer Science, GISMA University - Germany
degree_other: Master Business Administration (MBA), ESLSCA Business School - France
about_text: Software Engineer with 10+ years in .NET (C#, ASP.NET Core), React, Docker and SQL Server, delivering scalable cloud platforms for 500,000+ users. Specialized in microservices, REST APIs, and Azure services; German B1, visa-ready, seeking .NET focused roles.

freelance_researcher.title: Freelance Developer & MSc Researcher
freelance_researcher.details:
• Developed and implemented a website for a Kardiology practice in Aurich
• Worked on MSc thesis: ML-based customer segmentation
• Built e-commerce platform (React, Node.js, Docker)

senior_engineer.title: FullStack Engineer – National Government Info Center
senior_engineer.details:
• Led end-to-end development of parliamentary digital platforms, modernizing legacy systems with microservices (.NET Core, Docker) and Azure migration (30% cost reduction)
• Delivered a Xamarin tablet app for 1200 MPs, enabling real-time document access and annotation
• Built RESTful APIs for secure cross-ministry integrations and Kafka-based event tracking for committee workflows
• Achieved 99.9% uptime through Kubernetes and minimized deployment cycles from 1 week to 4 hours (Azure DevOps CI/CD)

software_engineer.title: Junior FullStack Engineer – NGIC
software_engineer.details:
• Built HR management system automating payroll processing (85% reduction in manual work) for 4000+ employees
• Integrated Azure Blob Storage for digital document management
• Optimized SQL queries improving report generation speed by 40%
• Introduced unit testing with xUnit framework

junior_engineer.title: Junior Backend Engineer – NGIC
junior_engineer.details:
• ASP.NET MVC backend for official site
• Migrated from DB2 to SQL Server, 100% data integrity
• Cut MP registration from 3h to 15min, automated reports
